xhtml:div.label: Genetic codes (-code) Universal Genetic code [TGA=* TAA=* TAG=*] (0) Vertebrate Mitochondrial code [AGR=* ATA=M TGA=W] (1) Yeast Mitochondrial code [CTN=* ATA=M TGA=W] (2) Filamentous fungi Mitochondrial code [TGA=W] (3) Insects and Plathyhelminthes Mitochondrial co [ATA=M TGA=W AGR=S] (4) Nuclear code of Cilitia [UAA=Q=Gln UAG=Q] (5) Nuclear code of Euplotes [UGA=C] (6) Mitochondrial code of Echinoderms UGA=W AGR=S AAA=N (7)

Fop/CBI codons (-f_type) Escherichia coli (0) Bacillus subtilis (1) Dictyostelium discoideum (2) Aspergillus nidulans (3) Saccharomyces cerevisiae (4) Drosophila melanogaster (5) Caenorhabditis elegans (6) Neurospora crassa (7)
CAI fitness values (-c_type) Escherichia coli (0) Bacillus subtilis (1) Saccharomyces cerevisiae (2)

All indices (-all_indices) Yes No

interface.label: Bulk output option Codon Usage (-cu) Amino Acid Usage (-aau) Relative Amino Acid Usage (-raau) Tabulation of codon usage (-cutab) Tabulation of dataset's codon usage (-cutot) Relative Synonymous Codon Usage (-rscu) Fasta format (-fasta) Reader format with codons are seperated by spaces (-reader) Conceptual translation of DNA to amino acid (-transl) Detailed report of codon G+C composition (-base) Dinucleotide usage of the three codon position (-dinuc) No bulk output to be written to file (-noblk)

Correspondence analysis options (available for several sequences) Do not perform a COA COA of codon usage frequencies (-coa_cu) COA of Relative Synonymous Codon Usage (-coa_rscu) COA on Amino Acid usage frequencies (-coa_aa)

xhtml:div.label: Generate detailed (expert) statistics on COA (-coa_expert) Yes No
Select number of axis to record (-coa_axes)

Select number of genes to use to identify optimal codons (-coa_num)?
Values can be whole numbers or a percentage (5 or 10%).
